title: Doom Bots
body: Does anyone actually enjoy the newer doom bots style or has everyone realised riot are just lazy with their difficulty and have to make their bots tanky now instead of smart and strong?

replies.body: On the other hand, we get to play Brand (so far, so good). R.I.P. Dumb Bots
Some of those bots are so annoying to deal with . The exreal bot ...with his 5 q's coming from 1 and his ult that triggers a chain reaction of them .

> [{quoted}](name=Purplerain14,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Y3p1QNNk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-30T09:26:03.244+0000)
>
> Some of those bots are so annoying to deal with . The exreal bot ...with his 5 q's coming from 1 and his ult that triggers a chain reaction of them .

It'd be fine even if the bots 1 shotted you the problem is you dodge everything and land all your abilities perfectly and get a good 1/100 of their hp down for it
